description:
After a successful audition, high school student Kotono Nagase and her best friend move into a dorm with eight other aspiring idols. They quickly realize it takes more than cute choreography and cute outfits to reach the top—it will take blood, sweat, and tears to advance in the idol-ranking VENUS program, where the top spot is held by superstar Mana Nagase…who happens to be Kotono’s older sister.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: ไอดอลลีไพรด์

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)

name.native: キューピーフラッパー

node.description:
QP:flapper is an illustrator unit conformed by the illustrators Tometa Ohara and Koharu Sakura.

[Twitter (Tometa Ohara's Account)](https://twitter.com/tometa_qp) | [Twitter (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://twitter.com/pimopimo) | [Pixiv (Koharu Sakura's Account)](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10538) | [Blog (Tometa Ohara's Blog)](http://tometa.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Blog (Koharu Sakura's Blog)](http://pimeco.blog10.fc2.com/) | [Official Website](http://qp.banbi.net/)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yukikishida) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuki_kishida) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7MhWrfW2HH8_umBaVNbUGw)__

__Yuuki Kishida__ is a Japanese composer, arranger, pianist and keyboardist affiliated with Kick Up Studio.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

__[Website](https://www.yukinara.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Nara_217) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yukinara217/)__

__Yuuki Nara__ is a Japanese guitarist, lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

**Height:** 157cm

[Website](https://www.sayaka-kanda.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sayakakanda) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sayakakanda/)

She was the daughter of singer [Seiko Matsuda](https://anilist.co/staff/110467).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HdkzTanaka)

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Kobe University (Faculty of Developmental Sciences, Department of Human Representation)

__Hidekazu Tanaka__ is a Japanese composer and arranger.

He left MONACA on July 31, 2021, and went independent. 

On October 24, 2022, he was arrested on suspicion of sexual assault of a teenage girl in Meguro, Tokyo in August of that year. On March 15, 2023, Tanaka admitted to obscenity charges which included saying obscene language to a 15-year-old girl, along with admitting to voyeurism at least dozens of times in the past 10 years.
